channel.title: How can I make myself admin?
channel.description: I am using a testscape source for my server. I try to make me admin by using character rights 3 but it still won't work. What is the problem? Is there another way I can make myself admin?

item.title: How can I make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @mitchtheblonde mitchtheblonde
item.description:
@mitchtheblonde wrote:

ok u have to go to client.java and search for this

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURCHARACTERSNAMEHERE")) { playerRights = 3; }

[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 11:15:50 PM[/size][hr]then go to the chracter files, make ur character rites 3 there too, compile, and wen u log in u should be creator. u should look for the tut were u can see ur own crown[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 11:16:37 PM[/size][hr]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49068.0.html

there it is

item.title: How can I make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @hardflip666 hardflip666
item.description:
@hardflip666 wrote:

go to ur folder with ur server stuff in it go to characters find ur name(make sure ur loged out) then look for

character-rights = 0

just change the 0 to a 3 then save then log in and ur owner =]

item.title: How can I make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Grim Reaper Ownage, post:1, topic:76395”]I am using a testscape source for my server. I try to make me admin by using character rights 3 but it still won’t work. What is the problem? Is there another way I can make myself admin?[/quote]Umm… If you want to make yourself Admin you put your rights to 2, but if you want to be Owner you make it 3. I don’t think by default Owner’s can see their own crown though, but there is a Tutorial somewhere about that.

Read full topic
